biotools.summary: The Nearest Neighbor Database (NNDB) is a web-based resource for disseminating parameter sets for predicting nucleic acid secondary structure stabilities. For each set of parameters, the database includes the set of rules with descriptive text, sequence-dependent parameters in plain text and html, literature references to experiments and usage tutorials. Also covered are parameters for predicting RNA folding free energy and enthalpy changes.
